title: South Carolina National Heritage Corridor: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           The South Carolina National Heritage Corridor PO Box 477  Belton, SC 29627                 Directions         The heritage area is located throughout the state of South Carolina.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Various Visit Centers There are various visitor centers throughout the corridor.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Monday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Tuesday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Wednesday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Thursday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Friday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Saturday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM             Weather           The weather varies throughout the year and even throughout the day. Please check the National Weather Service information at http://www.weather.gov for forecast information.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   N/A - $0.00 N/A         Visitor Centers              Â    The South Carolina National Heritage Corridor was designated by Congress in 1996 as a National Heritage Area. Stretching 17 counties and 320 miles across South Carolina, this area is committed to promoting and preserving the cultural, natural and historic resources of South Carolina.
